title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode) packaged as a single Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; sync/async APIs, POJO model mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (cuda/rocm/cpu) and compose examples for running Ollama containerised.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama with optional CUDA & ROCm accelerators; pinned hashes for reproducible builds.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server via slash commands and threads.
